Package com.sr2.flopbox.service

Class JwtTokenService

java.lang.Object
com.sr2.flopbox.service.JwtTokenService
public class JwtTokenService
extends Object
the JwtTokenService (Singleton pattern) class is in charge of parsing the token into credentials object and generating the token from the credentials object. Also in charge to generate the secret key each time the server is restarted
Author:
Adrien Holvoet

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Credentials decodeJWT​(String token)
    Tries to parse specified String as a JWT token.
    JwtToken generateToken​(Credentials credentials)
    Generates a JWT token containing username as subject, and username and password as additional claims.
    static JwtTokenService getInstance()
    Static method to return the unique JwtTokenService instance, create it if it does not exist

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static JwtTokenService getInstance()
      Static method to return the unique JwtTokenService instance, create it if it does not exist
      Returns:
      instance a instance of JwtTokenService

    • decodeJWT

      public Credentials decodeJWT​(String token)
      Tries to parse specified String as a JWT token. If successful, returns credentials object with username and mot de passe(extracted from token). If unsuccessful (token is invalid or not containing all required user properties), simply throw a exception catch later.
      Parameters:
      token - the JWT token to parse
      Returns:
      the credentials object extracted from specified token

    • generateToken

      public JwtToken generateToken​(Credentials credentials)
      Generates a JWT token containing username as subject, and username and password as additional claims. These properties are taken from the specified credentials object. Tokens validity is infinite.
      Parameters:
      credentials - the user for which the token will be generated
      Returns:
      the JWT token
